Articles.Content:
I was looking around http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/

And I found MOST soundtracks in KSP. They are called

Dreamy Flashback

Frost Waltz

If I missed some Post them Below. BYE
There is definitley more than that, but I don't remember the names.

They give credit to Kevin Macleod in the readme. Here's a full list of the songs:

Arcadia

Bathed in the Light

Brittle Rille,

Dreamy Flashback

Frost Waltz

Frost Waltz (Alternate)

Frozen Star

Groovy Grove

Impact Lento

Wizardtorium
